description:
Ready for trail running season, these tights support your mountain adventures throughout the year. The silicone print on the thighs provides helpful handholds when powering up tough hill climbs.Durable nylon with high elastane content provides plenty of stretch.Moisture wicking fabric is quick to dry.Wide elastic waist for a secure fit.Rear pocket panel stores running essentials.Connection system is compatible with other On modular apparel.

        Sustainability














                      Recycled content
name: On Trail Tights - Women's
